calculate_average.description:
Calculates the arithmetic mean of a list of numbers.

This function computes the average by summing all numbers in the input list and dividing by the count of elements. It provides a simple and efficient way to get the mean value.

parameters.numbers: List of numerical values to calculate the average from

calculate_average.returns: Float value representing the arithmetic mean of the input numbers

sort_items_by_key.description:
Sorts a list of dictionaries by a specified key.

This function takes a list of dictionary items and sorts them based on a specified key value. It supports both ascending and descending order through the reverse parameter.

parameters.items: List of dictionaries to be sorted
parameters.key: The dictionary key to use for sorting
parameters.reverse: Boolean flag to sort in descending order (default: False)

sort_items_by_key.returns: List of dictionaries sorted by the specified key

validate_email.description:
Validates an email address format using regex pattern matching.

This function checks if the provided email string matches the standard email format requirements. It verifies the presence of @ symbol, valid characters, and proper domain structure.

parameters.email: The email address string to validate

validate_email.returns: Boolean value indicating whether the email format is valid

DataProcessor.description:
A class for processing and caching data from a data source.

This class provides efficient data retrieval with built-in caching mechanisms to improve performance for repeated queries.

fetch_data.description: Retrieves data based on a query, using cache when available

parameters.query: The query string to fetch data for

fetch_data.returns: The requested data from the source or cache

process_text.description:
Processes text with various transformation options.

This function provides flexible text processing capabilities including case normalization and punctuation removal. It's useful for text preprocessing in NLP pipelines.

parameters.text: The input text string to process
parameters.lowercase: Boolean flag to convert text to lowercase (default: True)
parameters.remove_punctuation: Boolean flag to remove punctuation characters (default: False)

process_text.returns: Processed text string with applied transformations
